original_text: When the even was come, they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils: and he cast out the spirits with his word, and healed all that were sick:
korean_text: 저물매 사람들이 귀신 들린 자를 많이 데리고 예수께 오거늘 예수께서 말씀으로 귀신들을 쫓아 내시고 병든 자들을 다 고치시니

sentences.original_text: they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils:
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 귀신 들린 자들을 그에게 데려오니,

sentences.original_text: and he cast out the spirits with his word,
and healed all that were sick:
